title: PBE Error code 004
body:
Not sure if this is the place to go for posting stuff that happens in PBE, but I haven't found any other solutions. When I load up the PBE client, a popup says "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)"

Does anyone have a fix? I'm aware PBE has been going through some trouble recently.

EDIT: I solved it. Had to do a backup restore to fix it. Maybe I did something to my laptop that affected the patching somehow.

replies.body: Just as JustTrinM8 mentioned, that 004 code typically means something is going wrong with how your [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) are set up. Be sure to adjust those following the guide, but definitely hit me back up if it's not helping!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PUBEE3rL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-15T02:41:54.940+0000)
>
> Just as JustTrinM8 mentioned, that 004 code typically means something is going wrong with how your [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) are set up. Be sure to adjust those following the guide, but definitely hit me back up if it's not helping!

Hey! This is happening to me and I tried everything in the permissions guide to solving it but it still doesn't work. I have just downloaded it today. Please help.

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly. Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.[ Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)!

Stolen [from here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ooXw6dTa-common-tech-issues-patch-81-megathread) 

There's also an error code for 003.

> [{quoted}](name=JustTryinM8,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PUBEE3rL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-14T22:22:47.620+0000)
>
> This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly. Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.[ Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)!
> 
> Stolen [from here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ooXw6dTa-common-tech-issues-patch-81-megathread) 
> 
> There's also an error code for 003.

Thanks friend! I've heard of error code 003 but haven't had it.
